scenario.name: uac-call-basic
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field0 file="callee.csv"]@[field1 file="callee.csv"] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "[field2 file="caller.csv"]" <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field1 file="caller.csv"]>;tag=[call_number] To: "[field2 file="callee.csv"]" <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv"]@[field1 file="callee.csv"]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> User-Agent: sipfront.com [identity x5u="http://sipp.opensipit.sipfront.org/notfound.pem" attest="B" origtn_file="caller.csv" origtn_field="2" desttn_file="callee.csv" desttn_field="2"] Date: [current_date] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[field0 file="callee.csv"]@[field1 file="callee.csv"] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "[field2 file="caller.csv"]" <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[field1 file="caller.csv"]>;tag=[call_number] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> User-Agent: sipfront.com Content-Length: 0
